response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product, which has been meticulously crafted to deliver unparalleled performance and value. This exceptional item is not just a product; it's an investment in excellence. Given its quality and the unique features it offers, I believe it would significantly enhance your operations or personal endeavors. Considering its worth and the benefits it provides, I kindly propose a price of $15,000 for this opportunity. I look forward to your consideration and hope we can collaborate to achieve mutual success.", "product_price": 15000}
